carousel.title: The path is yours to choose.
carousel.description: No matter your skill level or experience, you'll find hikes that you and your friends will love.

download.title: Adventure awaits.
download.description: Great hikes are waiting to be discovered. Download the app today to get started.

intro.title: Only trails, never fails.
intro.description: Hikearound is the easiest way to discover, save, and share great local hikes.

map.title: Start local, go global.
map.description: Browse nearby hikes or expand your search across the entire country to find the perfect trail.
